message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $14,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $9,500 is significantly below its value. I could consider letting it go for $13,000.
I'm still interested in the product, but I think $13,000 is a bit steep. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $11,000. Can we discuss further?
